name: Merge Number!
description:
Merge Number! is an addictive 2048 game. You can play with different board sizes. All of them are very fun. You will get addicted!

HOW TO PLAY:
Swipe (Up, Down, Left or Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one.

- Different board sizes. Tiny (3x3), Standard (4x4), Big (5x5), Bigger (6x6), Very Big (8x8), Extreme (10x10)
- Leaderboard and High Scores.
- Smooth and addictive gameplay.
- Simple and modern design

Try to drag n merge them into a bigger number. You will find it easy to learn but difficult to master.
